verses.verse: Then I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> in the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> that was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> something like a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> in <S%H4758>appearance<s%> <S%H1823>resembling<s%> a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> them.

And He <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>"Enter<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1534>whirling<s%> <S%H1534>wheels<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H2651>hands<s%> with <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> and <S%H2236>scatter<s%> [them] <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>" And he <S%H935>entered<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

Now the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> were <S%H5975>standing<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>temple<s%> when the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>entered,<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

Then the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7311>went<s%> up from the <S%H3742>cherub<s%> to the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>temple,<s%> and the <S%H1004>temple<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and the <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Moreover, the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> like the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> when He <S%H1696>speaks.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1534>whirling<s%> <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%>" he <S%H935>entered<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> a <S%H212>wheel.<s%>

Then the <S%H3742>cherub<s%> <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> to the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> some and <S%H5414>put<s%> it into the <S%H2651>hands<s%> of the one <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> who <S%H3947>took<s%> [it] and <S%H3318>went<s%> out.
And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to have the <S%H8403>form<s%> of a man's <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

Then I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3742>cherub;<s%> and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> [was] like the <S%H5869>gleam<s%> of a <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And as for their <S%H4758>appearance,<s%> all <S%H702>four<s%> of them had the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H1823>likeness,<s%> as <S%H834>if<s%> one <S%H212>wheel<s%> were <S%H8432>within<s%> another <S%H212>wheel.<s%>

When they <S%H1980>moved,<s%> they <S%H1980>went<s%> in [any of] their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>directions<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5437>turning<s%> as they <S%H1980>went;<s%> but they <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H1980><s%> in the <S%H4725>direction<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H6437>faced,<s%> <S%H7218><s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5437>turning<s%> as they <S%H1980>went.<s%>

And their <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1320>body,<s%> their <S%H1354>backs,<s%> their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> belonging to all <S%H702>four<s%> of them.
The <S%H212>wheels<s%> were <S%H7121>called<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> the <S%H1534>whirling<s%> <S%H1534>wheels.<s%>

And <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces.<s%> The <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> [was] the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> [was] the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H9030>lion,<s%> and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle.<s%>
Then the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H7426>rose<s%> up. They are the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar.<s%>

Now when the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H1980>moved,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> would <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> them; also when the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H3671>wings<s%> to <S%H7311>rise<s%> from the <S%H776>ground,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> would not <S%H5437>turn<s%> from <S%H681>beside<s%> them.

When the cherubim <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5975>still,<s%> the wheels would <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5975>still;<s%> and when they <S%H7426>rose<s%> up, the wheels would <S%H7311>rise<s%> with them; for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> [was] in them.

Then the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3318>departed<s%> from the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>temple<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

When the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H3318>departed,<s%> they <S%H5375>lifted<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> and <S%H7426>rose<s%> up from the <S%H776>earth<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%> with the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> them; and they <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5975>still<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the Lord's <S%H1004>house.<s%> And the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4480>hovered<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

<S%H1931>These<s%> are the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8478>beneath<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> so I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they [were] <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

<S%H259>Each<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> and <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and <S%H8478>beneath<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> [was] the <S%H1823>form<s%> of <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> they were the <S%H1992>same<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4758>appearance<s%> I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar.<s%> <S%H376>Each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>straight<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6440>ahead.<s%>
